div1.p: I have just read a little story in a Chicago paper, telling about Professor Neihardt and his numerous honors and publications and saying that he had just recently been given a birthday party. I want to add my very best wishes also. I wish I could have been present.
How are you both? I often think of you and the wonderful visits I had with you. How are your daughter and her two little girls? Is she in charge of the farm?

For the past three years I have been teaching English in East Carolina College. The students are lovely, and this is really a very pleasant place to teach. However, I do feel somewhat "cooped up," more so as I live in a dormitory on the campus, only a few steps from the building in which I teach my classes. As you know, I love the country. But I am very happy.
Happy Birthday to Professor Neihardt and very kindest wishes to both of you!
